## Public Member Attributes

### ForgetAllSCEV {#a06e9230dbb1e24f5398518447f5aa568}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopUnrollPass.cpp&#125;::LoopUnroll::ForgetAllSCEV</>}>
If false, when <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> is invalidated, only forget everything in the top-most loop (call forgetTopMostLoop), of the loop being processed.

Otherwise, forgetAllLoops and rebuild when needed next.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp/#l01407">1407</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp">LoopUnrollPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### OnlyWhenForced {#a9b38d6cf75cc948e981de87f0dfee2bd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool anonymous&#95;namespace&#123;LoopUnrollPass.cpp&#125;::LoopUnroll::OnlyWhenForced</>}>
If false, use a cost model to determine whether unrolling of a loop is profitable.

If true, only loops that explicitly request unrolling via metadata are considered. All other loops are skipped.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp/#l01402">1402</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/loopunrollpass-cpp">LoopUnrollPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
